0.question: Can I reuse this project?
0.answer: Yes! This project is open-source and intended for reuse. You’re welcome to adapt it to your own needs.

1.question: What can I customize?
1.answer: You can easily change the text, colors, and branding by editing the JSON files. No deep coding knowledge is required.

2.question: Is the current version final?
2.answer: The deployed version is just one instance of the platform, specifically themed around database technology. You can modify it for other subjects as well.

3.question: Do I need a backend to run it?
3.answer: We use Supabase as the database, and Prisma makes it easy to switch to other solutions. Authentication is handled through a factory pattern, if you want to change the auth provider, you’ll need to implement your own strategy. Using Supabase works out of the box with minimal setup.

about.title: About the Project
about.0: This project was developed as part of a Bachelor's thesis in collaboration with a real-world customer: StudyComb.
about.1: StudyComb approached us with a vision to create a quiz platform that is modern, customizable, and easy to use for learners.
about.2: As an open-source initiative, the platform can be reused and modified. All texts, branding, and features are driven by simple JSON configurations.
about.3: Note that the deployed version is just an example setup focusing on the subject of database technology. You are free to adapt it to other academic topics or training areas.
